src:
Delusional Craigslist: Snickers entire bitesize collector set
07 Nov 2019, 20:45 by Mark Frauenfelder
I enjoy r/delusionalcraigslist, where people post ads for overpriced crap they found on Craigslist. Here's one where something is hoping to sell 8 bite-size Snickers bars, "including the elusive 'C' and 'K.'"
